p: Rosin-caprolactone diblock copolymers can be prepared from dehydroabietic ethyl methacrylate, Îµ-caprolactone and 2-hydroxyethyl 2-bromoisobutyrate according to Scheme 85 prior to precipitation and washing [ 170]. They can be applied in areas designed for simultaneously bio-based and biodegradable materials [ 170].
